Lararole

Lararole is a Laravel library, provides Role Management with permissions.

Get Started →

Simplicity First

Minimal setup with markdown-centered project structure helps you focus on writing.

Lararole Powered

This library provides a basic structure of application and instructions to use it. Using this manageable structure you can build large and robust applications.

Performant

Lararole is accessible, powerful, and provides tools required for large, robust applications.

PLEASE NOTE

This package will assume you are already using laravel authentication system and you have already users table in your database.

# Installation

composer install paxha/lararole

# Publish Configuration File

Before start development, lararole need configurations which will define Modules and User provider.

php artisan vendor:publish --provider="Lararole\LararoleServiceProvider"

This will export lararole.php in config. Setup modules with nesting modules. Example modules and nested modules are exported by default. There are also providers setup.
